climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Multifunction Cabinet】Just place this low space-saver drawer cabinet. in the closet as bedroom furniture or nightstand to offer a home for workout gear, blankets, and lingerie; place it in the nursery as a chest of drawers to store baby clothes and baby stuff; place storage drawer in the entryway for storage saving unit for frequently used items.

【Large Capacity】This small dresser offers 5 drawers to provide sufficient space for organizing daily necessities. 2 L and 3 M drawers are designed to satisfy your various storage needs. The wooden top of the bedroom portable dresser is great for keeping the most-used items within your reach. With plentiful space to organize, your room will always be kept in perfect order. Drawer dimensions: L (11.8" L x 11.8"W x 8.5" H) ；M（12"L x 11.4"W x 8.3" H）

【Durable Material】This drawer (fabric drawer) is made of high-quality breathable and non-woven synthetic fiber, harmless and wear-resistant, and suitable for kids, teens, and adults. Easy-pull drawers with plastic handles for smooth opening and closing. For easy cleaning, just wipe it clean with a piece of damp cloth and get it air-dried.

【Quality Construction】This drawer combines MDF boards with steel frames, cross support bars, and a drawer support shelf to make it sturdy under full load(66lb). Anti-tipping accessories are also equipped to prevent accidents. With 4 adjustable feet, you won't worry about stability even on uneven floors, and it is also adaptable to different spaces, so you can use it as an alternative to the TV stand cabinet.

【Easy to Assemble】The package will come with all the tools and accessories for quick assembly, which allows only about 20 minutes to assemble your dresser organizer with detailed instructions and the installation video. If you have encountered any problems, we would be delighted to help you find a solution and reply to your email within 24 hours.

From Customer Previous page Next page

Can this chest of drawers hold a 45 inch tv on the top? Yes. It's suggested to set up the anti-tipping accessories first. How deep are the drawers? The top 3 drawer dimension: 11.6"L x 11.02"W x 7.87" H. The bottom 2 drawer dimension: 18.1" L x 11.02" W x 7.87" H Are these fabric dressers stackable if buy more than 1? It could hold up to 33lbs on top, but for the safty, it's suggested to set up it side by side. How to get the replacements for the drawers? Just contact the seller via Amazon. The after-sales service team will solve problems you encountered. Is this dresser organizer easy to disassemble and move? Yes, it can be easily disassembled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is so cute! This was very easy to put together. The tools are included in the package. It's is smaller than we expected but it's a great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice set of drawers
reviews.reviewText: I thought it would be taller, but it turns out the perfect size for what I needed. Easy to put together and sturdy. My cat is hopping on and off it all day. I am impressed. The drawers are a perfect size. If I ever needed a dresser again, I would definitely consider this one or something else from this supplier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is cute but a little smaller than i expected. Wasn’t able to use in my bedroom because of the size but did put it in my living room behind the couch. I put some flowers on the top to dress it up and use it to my all my misc. things. Can take a good amount of stuff. It works perfectly for that. I would but again for maybe a den or office. The color is very nice. Easy to put together once you understand the fit of the pieces. Took me about 30 mins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for the price and very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This unit is great! It took me a little longer to assemble because I didn't read the directions as closely as I should have (put one part in the wrong place and then had to move it, and did it again in another spot.) The dimensions on mine were slightly off for the bottom drawers so I had to shave off about 1/4 inch from the inner cardboard lining to make them fit, but other than than it's way sturdier than I expected and perfect for holding random papers and lose items in my office under my desk. I have a U-shaped office desk and this fits perfectly underneath one section of it without interfering with my legroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but short, *updated
reviews.reviewText: I love the color, depth and length. I just wish there was an option to extend the height with extra metal leg extenders. It is still hard for older/disabled/weaker people to bend down that far. if you guys ever offer a leg extender kit you can take more of my money!Update: I downgraded to 3 stars. I really needed it taller so I purchased the one with 2 shelves. Was sent the wrong color. It's the wood tone but I ordered Gray. Doesn't match. The height is perfect and the product is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect storage option for my closet!
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy with this purchase! I was looking for an inexpensive storage/organization option for my closet. Just something simple to store my undergarments and workout clothes. This was perfect! It’s sturdy and super easy to assemble. It came well packaged and arrived quickly. It was bigger than I expected but I’m happy with that. Great deal for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the shell is made of metal so it doesn’t wobble or move at all and the drawers themselves have a thick front panel so they’re not flimsy either. Overall excellent buy. Also pretty simple to assemble if you’re paying attention lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, but very short.
reviews.reviewText: The desk is beautiful and easy to assemble, however, it is MUCH shorter than I had anticipated. Be sure to check the measurements before ordering.
